title: Schumer rejects Trump’s claim that bipartisan government shutdown negotiations are under way – live
summary: The Senate Democratic leader expressed willingness to collaborate with the president, stating, "if he’s finally ready to work with Democrats, we’ll be at the table." This statement indicates an openness to bipartisan efforts moving forward. It highlights a potential shift in cooperation between the administration and Democrats in Congress.

title: Global renewable energy generation surpasses coal for first time
summary: A recent report highlights that record solar energy expansion and consistent wind energy growth are pivotal in the global transition away from fossil fuels by 2025. This shift indicates a significant commitment to renewable energy sources. The findings emphasize the accelerating pace of this transformation in the energy sector.

title: US shutdown enters second week as Senate again rejects rival funding bills
summary: Competing health care bills failed to meet the 60-vote threshold needed for passage. Meanwhile, former President Trump suggested the possibility of a deal with Democrats regarding health subsidies. The situation leaves uncertainty about future health care legislation.
